name: Root of Darkness
description:
Fight against the elder tree and save the kingdom with your friends!

 - WASD to move

 - Space to interact (pick up items)

 - Left click to attack

Defeat the root of all evil in the center of the map - the Elder Tree and claim victory! Supports up to 20 players.

Submission for the Global Game Jam 2023, with the theme: Roots

Source: https://github.com/grakp/GGJ-2023

GGJ link: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/root-darkness-4
